name: Project Intero
description:
Project Intero is a Narrative-Focused, Cinematic Action RPG. Inspired by older generation games such as Kingdom Hearts, Final Fantasy X and Jak II: Renegade - While cinematics are inspired by current-gen games such as Plague Tale.

It is also my very first game! 

It was entirely developed by one developer within 6 weeks using only Free Assets.

I did this as a portfolio piece as I've recently broken into the Game Development world - Previously as a QA Tester / Narrative Editor for Big Ben's Paranoia: Happiness is Mandatory. Before this, I was a Filmmaker / Editor - which I got my degree in.

Sadly it's very tough in Ireland to get a Game Development job - especially without a degree in gaming. So I taught myself Unity and created this game within 6 weeks to help prove myself as a game developer. 

This game is short and free and I hope you guys will take the time to play through it, and let me know what you guys think! I am open to hearing ALL criticism! :)

Any donations aren't necessary, but will be deeply appreciated! Enjoy!
